fields.name: Passives:
fields.value: - Records: Learn 3 names and 1 Order role that IS in this game. One of those people will be the role you learned. [AOR2]

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Inspect: Choose 2 dead players. Learn if one of them is true non-Order. This cannot be used on players whose roles are publicly revealed. [1 use, Unique]
- Revisit: Choose 3 alive players. Learn how many of them are Order. Influenceable. [1 use, Unique, UOR2]
- Links: Choose a dead player, and learn 3 non-King names. One of them shares the same true faction as the dead player. This cannot be used on players whose roles are publicly revealed. [1 use, Unique, UOR3]
